data.name: FreeStyleFootball - Ginger Package
data.detailed_description:
Special Character Ginger Package

The following items are included:
• Special Character Ginger
• 30,000 Points
• XP which is equal to Level 40


Note
Poistion of Ginger is selectable, but it's best suited for MF.
Ginger is fast in speed and has Through Pass ability, making her skillful in plays that make her attack deep.


How to use
DLC items will be sent to your mailbox when purchased.
As you use DLC package item from item locker, you will receive 30,000 points instantly.
XP is included in the character item. It will be automatically used as you create the character.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: window XP
  • Processor: P4 2.8GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 6200
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Generic Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: window 7
  • Processor: P4 3.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 7600GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Generic Sound Card
